title: Ping went up by 5-10 in new patch?
body: So a few weeks ago i noticed a ping drop from my normal 60-63 and was hovering 57--59 and since the new patch me ( and multiple friends of mine ) have been getting 65-70 ping and idk what the problem is as im running all these trace routes and ran winMTR and all of them say that the average is around 55 ( never got that low but yea ) and so i was wondering if anybody from cali has had these problems.

replies.body: Can you drop a fresh 5-minute WinMTR traceroute here in a reply? I'd like to see what your route looks like to our servers and where your latency is rising.

Your traceroute shows your connection taking a really weird route to the NA servers. It's possible there were some routing changes at your ISP that caused this, so I recommend reaching out to a tier 2 support agent at your ISP. You'll want to provide them this traceroute so they'll have more context on the issue and can launch a proper investigation.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
